name: Abundance of Luck
description: Upon use, immediately regenerates 30% Energy for all allies and increases DMG dealt by 15% for the next battle.
story:
The gray-haired outlander brought many novel concepts to Okhema, and this drink was one of them. After countless sleepless nights and tireless effort, several of the best drinksmiths finally recreated the "coffee" that the Navigator had carefully crafted in the outlander's memories.
According to {F#her}{M#him}, it tasted even better than what {F#she}{M#he} remembered.

"Ah... so coffee doesn't have to scald your esophagus after all!"
